data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about a time when you were disappointed.
data.answer: I was disappointed when I heard the news that I failed the history final exam. I was expecting to pass as I have spent a lot of time preparing for the test. I was so disappointed because it means all the work I have done was for nothing. However, I have learned something from this experience. That is, I realized that I need to prepare for the test earlier rather than a week before the final exam. It means I need to do the review every week during the semester and make sure that I acquire the knowledge rather than only reciting it.

options.content: Did you learn anything from this experience?
